description:
A famous and longest-serving Prima Undine, who started http://anidb.net/ch7786 [Aria Company] with http://anidb.net/ch7787 [Aria Pokoteng] after realizing she was missing too much of life as http://anidb.net/ch125951 [Himeya]`s top ace. She was Prima Undine for 30 years and mentor to http://anidb.net/ch1287 [Alicia], her last disciple, to whom she left the company on her retirement. She is highly respected by young Undines, especially http://anidb.net/ch8499 [Alice], and is known as "Grandmother" or more informally "http://anidb.net/ch1289 [Grandma]". Her appellation has never been revealed.
Note: Ametsuchi Akino as she appears during a flashback in http://anidb.net/e86938 [Aria the Origination episode 7].
name: Ametsuchi Akino
